Zamanında parayla almıştım.Küçüktük o zamanlar,oynadım oynadım 256 saat oynamışım yıllar önce bıraktım yine başlayacağım da zevkine.Oyunda skin mkin vardı tamam eyv de battle royal getirdiler,bedava yaptılar CHARACTER SKIN getirdiler falan? Noluyor agaa yani?? Neyse oyunu 256 saat oynamışım ama rütbe gümüşten yukarıyı görmedi yetenek mi fakirlik mi bilemiyorum sonuç olarak Counter-Strike gibi efsane bir serinin en berbat oyunu olduğunu düşünüyorum,o eski 1.6 nın zevki asla olamaz olmayacak da.

Un clásico que todos deberían tener instalado.

Please, stop what you are doing, and take a very good look at my logged hours at the time of this review. It would mean a whole lot to me. Now that you hopefully had a little giggle or cough, know that I have pretty good experience playing this game. After (wasting) so long trapped inside an alternate universe where I blow up my own teammates, or pretend to defuse the bomb, ultimately letting it blow up so I get play with my team a little longer. Not to mention my favorite CSGO activity: +left so I can go poop and not get kicked from the game. On a serious note... just kidding this is CSGO, nothing about this game is, or will ever be serious. So PLEASE remember to be nice to the community and don't get upset over a lucky head shot around a corner while b-hopping. It's just not worth loosing actual brain cells over. I have very few left unfortunately. And with such a toxic community anyway, it's best to not be a sheep. Now, I tend to bag on this game a little hard, and could tell you thousands of reasons why you shouldn't play it, yet can still find it in me to recommend it. Why you may ask? Well let me kindly refer you back to my logged hours over the past 6 years of my very, sad and lonely life.
